title: This is Where You’re Supposed To Be
description:
“We all feel pulled. To do more. To go more places. To make more progress. We are dogged by the constant worry we’re in the wrong place, doing the wrong thing—or rather, there is some

where else, somewhere better that we could, that we should, be.”

Ryan explains why you must embrace the present moment. 

Sign up for the Daily Stoic email: http://DailyStoic.com/signup

Follow us: Instagram, Twitter, YouTube, TikTok, and Facebook
